posts.post_title: CLOSED-- T206 MANNING & HOF JOSS (SOLD)-Both SGC 40 VG 3--CLOSED
posts.post_content:

HOFer ADDIE JOSS (Portrait)-CLE NAPS SGC 40 VG 3- BRIGHT COLOR & CONTRAST! Sharp & Clean!

Both cards are from the Roy Mellinger Collection:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=118774&highlight=t206[/url]

1st "I'll take it" is good! PM or EM me w/ address.

Fred
Manning has been reduced one more time! (See original post)
